channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: Bill Gates, quotes from ‘Lolita’ on woman’s body: What newly released Epstein photos reveal
Ukraine to US midterms: Will 2026 seal Trump's place in history?
Who was Claudio Valente, Brown University shooting suspect who also killed MIT professor?
Who was Sharif Osman Hadi? Why has his killing resulted in anti-India violence across Bangladesh?
History Today: When Bill Clinton was impeached over affair with Monica Lewinsky
FirstUp: Putin to hold annual presser, deadline to release Epstein files today... The big news
Why Oman is a big factor in India’s West Asia calculus
item.description: For India, Oman is a reliable gateway to the Gulf, devoid of the hyper-political baggage that often accompanies ties with larger regional powers

item.title: The cost of moral evasion: How antisemitism and anti-India terror share the same justifications
item.description: If the West wishes to prevent future terror attacks, it must look beyond the individual attacker and interrogate the ecosystem that made such violence imaginable, defensible and ultimately executable

item.title: PM Modi in Oman: Why the visit matters in India’s West Asia calculus
item.description: The India-Oman collaboration in trade, security, defence, critical minerals, cutting-edge technology, green energy and space research will pave the way for the resurgence of the Global South from colonially imposed stagnation

item.title: Why the UN should ban Pakistani and Bangladeshi peacekeepers
item.description: The United Nations’ reliance on Pakistani and Bangladeshi peacekeepers risks exporting radicalisation into some of the world’s most fragile conflict zones

item.title: India-Ethiopia strategic partnership: A Global South alliance in a shifting world order
item.description: Ethiopia is not just a bilateral partner but a key stakeholder in India’s vision of a developed, assertive Global South

item.title: PM Modi in Oman: A timeless maritime partnership enters a new strategic phase
item.description: Trade and economic cooperation have been the fulcrum of the relationship, with bilateral trade already exceeding $10 billion
